website_summaries.verdict: Casual and good-looking, suitable to wear with casual and dressy outfits.
pros: Versatile for dressing up or down
Stretch fabric upper with reinforced leather heel
Treaded sole is lightweight, flexible,and shock-absorbent
cons: Stiff across the top of the shoe, especially during the break-in period

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort!
customer_reviews.text: After years of cramming my feet into high heeled pointy toed shoes and wondering why my feet were killing me at the end of the day, I went on a search for, I hate to say it, "comfortable shoes". I've ordered many, kept few and even those I have kept weren't quit right...until now. These shoes are so comfortable I ordered a second pair in the same color. I removed the insoles and inserted my own and regardless if I'm on my feet all day or not, my feet feel great. I highly recommend them. I wish they came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: TRY THEM ON IMMEDIATELY AND IF THEY DONT FIT ASK FOR REFUND OR EXCHANGE IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.text: I am sure these are lovely shoes ... CAUTION ... try them on immediately and if they don't fit ask for refund or exchange immediately. Unfortunately due to my travel schedule and other complications, I missed the deadline for returning. They definitely run very narrow ... I ordered the medium and I couldn't even get them on my feet. Service was great, but I missed the boat on the refund or exchange ... so I'm out the amount of the shoes ... if you have a narrow foot and wear size ten, have I got a deal for you!
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit!
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I purchase a pair of shoes and wear them right out of the box all day without breaking them in, it makes me happy and these shoes made me very happy. I have fairly narrow heels so they step out of many shoes but not this one. I ordered the B width but still had no problem. Excellent shoe!
customer_reviews.author: wideopenseasTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes for every day
customer_reviews.text: I live in these shoes. I travel a lot and can wear them everywhere. They aren't the most glamorous shoes, but they manage to look decent day after day, they don't show much wear, and you can wear them with slacks or skirts. I walk for miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: CEC

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shoe.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I decided to try the 81/2 and it is the right fit. It was a bit snug on toes and top of foot. Sprayed with a shoe stretch product and wore around the house for 3-4 days. Loosened up and now fits perfectly and is comfortable. Looks good with pants.
customer_reviews.author: tourdir

customer_reviews.title: Munro Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Munro Traveler in black stretch fabric is comfortable. After three wearings the fabric is still very tight across the instep, making it slightly difficult to get on. The fabric at the instep is already showing discoloration from being pulled on. I have worn the Munro American Cindi for years and my original pair still looks great. Not sure the Traveler will continue to look as good.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Stepko

customer_reviews.title: The only shoe you need in your closet
customer_reviews.text: But of course in every color. You could travel around the world with one pair of these awesome comfortable supportive shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: need an insert to make them work better for "me"
customer_reviews.text: These shoes wear well for a few hours, if you have no foot issues as I do; need an insert to make them work better for "me".
customer_reviews.author: Annie W.

customer_reviews.title: Munro
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great comfort, thinking of ordering another pair in beige to leave in my vacation home so that I'm not schlepping shoes back and forth
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Needs heel inserts.
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is same as other reviewers, heel area rubs and heel may be too deep. otherwise, very comfortable. Have bought heel inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Benz

customer_reviews.title: Not As Rigid As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was told at physical therapy to wear Munro Americans for my plantar fasciitis as you should wear a rigid shoe. I've had two other styles of American Munros previously that were great. This style does not seem as rigid, though.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Henry

customer_reviews.title: ... to find an insert that will her heel fit better. wide enough for her feet
customer_reviews.text: My wife needs to find an insert that will her heel fit better. wide enough for her feet, but a little too long. Would like to find an insert that comes up the heel also to create a tighter fit.
customer_reviews.author: Wilber Hammack

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic walking shoe Wonderful shoe for walking. Lot of room at toes area. Would buy it again when it is needed
customer_reviews.author: West Indies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable slippers (although they are like shoes) they have arch and heel support. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: pappyj

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I have found that Munro shoes always are so comfortable and reliable. These run a bit short so ordered half size larger
customer_reviews.author: Happy feet

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 84-year-old mother who said not only were the shoes extremely comfortable, but that they were pretty and didn't look like "old-lady shoes."
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable Munro shoes I have ever purchased. Narrow from instep to toes and no padding. Very disappointed. Have LOVED every pair I have bought in the past so was very surprised. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Mary H Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So good I bought them a second time after I lost them on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: coppertop

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very large. Different last than other Munros I have. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Willamettegirl

customer_reviews.title: Too small and tight
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was attractive but 7.5 was too tight. This is the shoe size I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a well-made shoe, the wide width was still narrow on my foot. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: but I think that they will be comfortable over a period of time
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these shoes all day yet, but I think that they will be comfortable over a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Munro shoes fit my narrow foot and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Munro shoes fit my narrow foot and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: boston reader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed again
customer_reviews.text: 14B too long and big. 13N a tad too tight. No real support for flat feet. Returned the. Too expensive to not fit.perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: cms

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe except width is a lttle narrow
customer_reviews.text: The length was right but the width was narrow for a wide I am sending them back and have already ordered the xwide hopefully they will be wide enough because I liked the feel of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tausch

customer_reviews.title: Need instructions for exchange
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe style. It is my second pair. However, my shoe size in 8 1/5 Medium. These SS shoes are so narrow I cannot get them on my feet. Please send instructions for exchange. There were no instructions in the box. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my mother in law for a trip to Europe. She loves everything about the shoe! Says the style, the fit and the comfort are 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: virginiapm

customer_reviews.title: Too small, too narrow on my toes.
customer_reviews.text: Too small and narrow, and I could hardly slip it on. I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pris  King

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Walking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing them at work where I walk a lot, very comfortable and provide a lot of support. Planning on wearing them a lot on an upcoming trip as a tourist abroad.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia R. Keleher

customer_reviews.title: Love them so much I bought another pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair as a back-up pair when my original ones finally give out. I took them on 2 trips with no break in time and they were the most comfortable pair. In the winter - they are my go to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JoyfulAbundance

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were supposed to be new, but they were not in a box and were worn!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes everyday on a 3 week trip to Europe, while site seeing for hours everyday. My feet were so happy. I never thought about my feet at all. I was tired, but my feet were not. Some days I wore thin socks, other days no socks. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.  Comfortable.  Reach for this shoe over all others.
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Munro shoes. They fit my slightly narrow foot well, are very, very comfortable and are attractive. I find myself not shopping for other shoe brands...just look at what Munro has to offer. There will be a day when I have nothging but Munro Shoes, tennis shoes and flip flops in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Shoe Mall
customer_reviews.text: I returned the shoes because they were too narrow. Very unhappy that I had to pay $13.05 return shipping (even though I have Prime). Basically paid this to try on a pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Couldn't get it on my left foot. Had a pair of munro shoes, thought these were smiller, but didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customershirrleymmo62q1 Customershirrleymmo62were I

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a great design for walking without being "clunky". One can walk during the day and attend at least dressy affairs without changing shoes. Only problem was the wrong size, had to return them, but have not received credit yet so not sure whether retailer will provide correct credit which should be 100%. I didn't wear them except for trying them on to find the wrong size, returned them in time, and packaged properly.
customer_reviews.author: Oregonian in New York

customer_reviews.title: Munro does it again
customer_reviews.text: Munro shoes consistently provide a comfortable, quality support for tender feet.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Russell

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 1/2 narrow. My left foot is slightly smaller than my right foot. On my right foot, the shoe was quite tight (it was fine on the left foot). However, I had the right foot shoe stretched and it fits a bit better now. Otherwise, the shoe is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Soles don't last - crack and break
customer_reviews.text: I was dismayed to notice that the sole cracked and then started breaking apart. I don't wear the shoes that much. You can see that the tops, back, and inside of the shoe are in great shape. These are really expensive shoes to have them use shoddy materials on the sole. These shoes are very comfortable! Fortunately, they have narrow sizes that fit my narrow feet. I don't want to just throw them away, but how can I wear them when the sole is deteriorating? It doesn't look like Munro stands by their workmanship or materials.
customer_reviews.author: K. M

customer_reviews.title: "Stretch fabric" has very little stretch.
customer_reviews.text: These were much stiffer than I expected for something described as "black stretch fabric". I could not get them on with my high instep, and had to return them. I have loved other shoes from this brand, but this style did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A. Levinson

product_meta.title: Munro Women's Traveler
product_meta.description: You'll love the lightweight stability you get in this Munro Women's Traveler Slip-On Shoe. Thanks to the Munro Tech polyurethane outsole, you'll get flexible slip resistance and shock absorption, and the riveted steel shank delivers durable support. A combination last gives you a heel that's narrower than the forefoot for a more comfortable fit, and a contoured polyurethane footbed can be removed to accommodate a custom orthotic. The knit soft linings breathe to promote a healthy, dry foot environment. Orthotic-Friendly.
feature_bullets: Munro Tech outsole delivers flexible shock absorption and slip resistance.
Breathable knit soft lining wicks away moisture to help keep feet dry and comfortable.
Contoured polyurethane footbed adds cushioning and accommodates personal orthotics.
Stretch polyamide / spandex upper, knit soft polyester / nylon upper lining and sockliner...
Polyurethane insole, steel shank, Munro Tech polyurethane outsole.
